entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the main character who is walking around the edge of the field and watching something.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is introduced as a person who wakes up with a start and tells Harry and Ron to go back to the castle.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as Harry's friend who is walking out of the stadium with him.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is introduced as a broomstick that Harry and Ron are discussing.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is described as a cat who is crouching among the budding leaves of a tree.

relationships.description: Madam Hooch told Harry to go back to the castle.
Ron and Harry were discussing the Firebolt's superbly smooth action, phenomenal acceleration, and pinpoint turning.
Harry saw Crookshanks crouching among the budding leaves of a tree.
Ron used his wand to illuminate Crookshanks with a beam of light.
